title: Get access to migration scripts currently located in "Arthur's private repo"

content.raw:
Hi all,

‌

I’m following the instructions [here](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/Model%20Migration%20Guide) to submit  a custom robot model, but then I reach point number 9 I’m blocked at the following step:

> **Note** This and other migration scripts are currently located in [Arthur's private repo](https://bitbucket.org/acschang/subt_model_checkout/src/migration_script/model_checkout_ws/src/ign_migration_scripts/) in the `migration_script` branch.

So the question is” how do I get access to the migration scripts? If i click on the reported link, I cannot access the repo \(error message “We can't let you see this page“\).

‌

Thanks for your help,

‌

Marco.
content.html:
Hi all,

‌

I’m following the instructions here to submit a custom robot model, but then I reach point number 9 I’m blocked at the following step:

Note This and other migration scripts are currently located in Arthur's private repo in the migration_script branch.

So the question is” how do I get access to the migration scripts? If i click on the reported link, I cannot access the repo (error message “We can't let you see this page“).

‌

Thanks for your help,

‌

Marco.
